definitions.definition: The highest or uppermost part of something.
examples: His kite got caught at the top of the tree.

subdefinitions.definition: The part of something that is usually highest or uppermost .
examples: We flipped the machine onto its top .

subdefinitions.definition: The uppermost part of a page , picture , viewing screen , etc.
examples: Further weather information can be found at the top of your television screen.
Headings appear at the tops of pages.

subdefinitions.definition: A lid , cap , or cover of a container .
examples: Put a top on the toothpaste tube or it will go bad.

subdefinitions.definition: A garment worn to cover the torso .
examples: I bought this top as it matches my jeans.

subdefinitions.definition: A framework at the top of a ship 's mast to which rigging is attached .
The first half of an inning , during which the home team fields and the visiting team bats .
The crown of the head , or the hair upon it; the head.

definitions.definition: The near end of somewhere.
examples: The patio is at the top of my garden.
The shop is at the top of my street.

definitions.definition: A child 's spinning toy ; a spinning top .
examples: The boy was amazed at how long the top would spin.

definitions.definition: Someone who is eminent .

subdefinitions.definition: The chief person ; the most prominent one.
The highest rank ; the most honourable position ; the utmost attainable place .
examples: to be at the top of one's class, or at the top of the school

definitions.definition: A peak price of a security during a trading period, before it begins a downward trend.
A dominant partner in a sadomasochistic relationship or roleplay .

subdefinitions.definition: A dominant partner in a sexual relationship.

definitions.definition: A person who penetrates or has a preference for penetrating during intercourse .
examples: I prefer being a top , and my boyfriend prefers being a bottom.

definitions.definition: Fellatio ; a blowjob .
definitions.label_groups: slang , vulgar , African-American Vernacular , MLE , MTE

definitions.definition: A top quark .
The utmost degree ; the acme ; the summit .
A plug or conical block of wood with longitudinal grooves on its surface , in which the strands of the rope slide in the process of twisting .
Highest pitch or loudest volume .
examples: She sang at the top of her voice.

definitions.definition: A bundle or ball of slivers of combed wool , from which the noils , or dust , have been taken out .
Eve ; verge ; point .
labels: except in one sense of phrase on top of
definitions.label_groups: obsolete, except in one sense of phrase on top of

definitions.definition: The part of a cut gem between the girdle , or circumference , and the table , or flat upper surface .
Topboots .
A stroke on the top of the ball .
A forward spin given to the ball by hitting it on or near the top; topspin .
a group of a specified number of people eating at a restaurant .
labels: A table at which there is
or which has enough seats for
label_groups: in restaurants , preceded by a number
A table at which there is, or which has enough seats for

definitions.definition: Ellipsis of topswarm .
The First Sergeant or Master Sergeant (U.S. Marine Corps), senior enlisted man at company level.
a shoot (eaten as a vegetable).

main_definition: The highest or uppermost part of something.
secondary_definitions: The near end of somewhere.
A child 's spinning toy ; a spinning top .
Someone who is eminent .
( finance ) A peak price of a security during a trading period, before it begins a downward trend.
( BDSM ) A dominant partner in a sadomasochistic relationship or roleplay .
( LGBTQ slang ) A person who penetrates or has a preference for penetrating during intercourse .
( slang , vulgar , African-American Vernacular , MLE , MTE ) Fellatio ; a blowjob .
( particle physics ) A top quark .
The utmost degree ; the acme ; the summit .
( ropemaking ) A plug or conical block of wood with longitudinal grooves on its surface , in which the strands of the rope slide in the process of twisting .
( sound ) Highest pitch or loudest volume .
( wool manufacture ) A bundle or ball of slivers of combed wool , from which the noils , or dust , have been taken out .
( obsolete, except in one sense of phrase on top of ) Eve ; verge ; point .
The part of a cut gem between the girdle , or circumference , and the table , or flat upper surface .
( in the plural , slang , dated ) Topboots .
( golf , cue sports , racquet sports ) A stroke on the top of the ball .
( golf , cue sports , racquet sports ) A forward spin given to the ball by hitting it on or near the top; topspin .
( in restaurants , preceded by a number ) (A table at which there is, or which has enough seats for) a group of a specified number of people eating at a restaurant .
Ellipsis of topswarm .
( military ) The First Sergeant or Master Sergeant (U.S. Marine Corps), senior enlisted man at company level.
( Philippines , usually in the plural ) a shoot (eaten as a vegetable).
